content.question: Based on the data in the graphs, which of the following best describes the relationship between <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature?

choices.label: A decrease in <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration preceded an increase in Antarctic temperature.

An increase in Antarctic temperature preceded a decrease in <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration.

There is a direct relationship between <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature, but causality cannot be determined.

There is an inverse relationship between <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature, but causality cannot be determined.

content.answer: There is a direct relationship between <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>C</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>O</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> concentration and Antarctic temperature, but causality cannot be determined.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Describe relationships among variables in data represented.
